content.description: In the following procedure, the parameter numList is a list of numbers and the parameters j and k are integers.
content.question: PROCEDURE swapListElements(numList, j, k){newList <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> numListnewList[j] <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> numList[k]newList[k] <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> numList[j]RETURN(newList)}Which of the following is the most appropriate documentation to appear with the swapListElements procedure?

choices.label: Returns a copy of numList with the elements at indices j and k interchanged.The value of j must be between 0 and the value of k, inclusive.
Returns a copy of numList with the elements at indices j and k interchanged.The values of j and k must both be between 1 and LENGTH(numList), inclusive.
Interchanges the values of the parameters j and k.The value of j must be between 0 and the value of k, inclusive.
Interchanges the values of the parameters j and k.The values of j and k must both be between 1 and LENGTH(numList), inclusive.

content.answer: Returns a copy of numList with the elements at indices j and k interchanged.The values of j and k must both be between 1 and LENGTH(numList), inclusive.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a code segment or program functions.
